messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: UKIP is the party which is shaking up the stale political establishment and brimming with ideas and energy to empower Britain and her people. Help me to restore democracy from Brussels to Britain and enable you to call referenda on big local issues like the future of Peckham Rye station and Southwark Woods.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP will prioritise housing for local people and stop the ever increasing pressure on NHS waiting times and our city's green spaces by controlling our borders.
Restoring democracy from Brussels to Britain and enabling referenda on big local issues.

issues.brexitEurope: Restoring democracy from Brussels to Britain.
issues.governance: Enabling you to call referenda on big local issues like the future of Peckham Rye station and Southwark Woods.
issues.health: Stop the ever increasing pressure on NHS waiting times

housing.content: Prioritise housing for local people and stop the ever increasing pressure on our city's green spaces by controlling our borders.

images.caption: Image of David Kurten with UK Independence Party branding and tagline 'Standing Up for Real Change'
